title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When attempting to click on the first Combo in the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog, it fails to take focus.
OB: Currently, when clicking on the first Combo, it does not receive focus and the focus caret remains unchanged.
EB: The expected behavior is that when clicking on the first Combo labeled as 'Host:', it should receive focus and the focus caret should be displayed within the Combo.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:

1. Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog.
2. Attempt to click on the first Combo labeled as 'Host:'.
